021import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
022import net.tnemc.core.EconomyManager;
023import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
024import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
025import net.tnemc.core.account.PlayerAccount;
026import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.modify.HoldingsModifier;
027import net.tnemc.core.actions.source.PlayerSource;
028import net.tnemc.core.config.MessageConfig;
029import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
030import net.tnemc.core.transaction.Transaction;
031import net.tnemc.core.transaction.TransactionResult;
032import net.tnemc.core.utils.exceptions.InvalidTransactionException;
033import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
034import net.tnemc.item.component.impl.LoreComponent;
035import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
036import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
037import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
038import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.utils.HandlerResponse;
039
040import java.math.BigDecimal;
041import java.util.Optional;
042
043/**
044 * PlayerInteractHandler
045 *
046 * @author creatorfromhell
047 * @since 0.1.2.0
048 */
049public class PlayerInteractHandler {
050
051  /**
052   * Used to handle a PlayerInteractEvent using the specified {@link PlayerProvider} class.
053   *
054   * @param provider The {@link PlayerProvider} associated with the platform event.
055   *
056   * @return True if the event should be cancelled, otherwise false.
057   */
058  public HandlerResponse handle(final PlayerProvider provider, final AbstractItemStack<?> item) {
059
060    final HandlerResponse response = new HandlerResponse("", false);
061
062    final Optional<Account> account = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(provider.identifier());
063    if(account.isPresent() && (account.get() instanceof PlayerAccount) && item.customName().isPresent()
064       && Component.EQUALS.test(item.customName().get().customName(), Component.text(MessageConfig.yaml().getString("Messages.Note.Name")))) {
065
066      String currency = null;
067      String region = null;
068      String amount = null;
069
070      final String curCompare = MessageConfig.yaml().getString("Messages.Note.Currency").split(":")[0];
071      final String regionCompare = MessageConfig.yaml().getString("Messages.Note.Region").split(":")[0];
072      final String amtCompare = MessageConfig.yaml().getString("Messages.Note.Amount").split(":")[0];
073
074      final Optional<? extends LoreComponent<? extends AbstractItemStack<?>, ?>> loreOptional = item.lore();
075
076      if(loreOptional.isPresent()) {
077
078        for(final Component component : loreOptional.get().lore()) {
079          //TODO: Fix
080          final String[] info = component.toString().split(":");
081          if(info.length < 2) continue;
082
083
084          if(info[0].contains(curCompare)) {
085            currency = info[1].split("\"")[0].trim();
086          } else if(info[0].contains(regionCompare)) {
087            region = info[1].split("\"")[0].trim();
088          } else if(info[0].contains(amtCompare)) {
089            amount = info[1].split("\"")[0].trim();
090          }
091
092        }
093      }
094
095      if(currency == null || region == null || amount == null) return response;
096
097
098      final Optional<Currency> curObj = TNECore.eco().currency().find(currency);
099      if(curObj.isEmpty() || curObj.get().getNote().isEmpty()) return response;
100
101      final BigDecimal value = new BigDecimal(amount);
102
103      final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(region, curObj.get().getUid(), value);
104
105      final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("note")
106              .from(account.get(), modifier)
107              .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
108              .source(new PlayerSource(provider.identifier()));
109
110      try {
111        final TransactionResult result = transaction.process();
112
113        if(!result.isSuccessful()) {
114          provider.message(new MessageData(result.getMessage()));
115          return response;
116        }
117
118        if(result.getReceipt().isPresent()) {
119
120          PluginCore.server().calculations().removeItem(curObj.get().getNote().get().stack(currency, region, value), provider.identifier());
121
122          final MessageData claimed = new MessageData("Messages.Note.Claimed");
123          claimed.addReplacement("$currency", currency);
124          claimed.addReplacement("$amount", amount);
125          provider.message(claimed);
126          return response;
127        }
128      } catch(final InvalidTransactionException e) {
129        e.printStackTrace();
130      }
131      provider.message(new MessageData("Messages.Note.Failed"));
132    }
133    return response;
134  }
135}
